name: Masplado
description:
A game that was inspired in bootlegs, most graphics made from scratch, and obviously, an original story,
masplado is a plataform game with in total 33 levels (without counting the sub-levels) and 7 worlds
the gameplay is a little complicated for those who are not so expert in games with hard levels

also, the game have a big variety of enemies and backgrounds.


some observations:

  • the menu is very simple
  • in the options screen have all the guide to how to play
  • the game is saved automatically
  • this game was made for teenagers and adults, it's not recommended for children
    (because of the dark humor jokes and minor details that are not appropriate for children)
